```coq
intros h ps sigma os st' ms Hreach Hdo Hout.
assert (Hout' : in_output_list client id out os) by assumption.
assert (Hsigma : forall h', applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h' st') = applied_entries sigma).
{
  intros h'.
  assert (HlastApplied : lastApplied st' = lastApplied (sigma h')) by (apply doGenericServer_commitIndex; assumption).
  apply applied_entries_log_lastApplied_update_same; assumption.
}
assert (Hout_correct : output_correct client id out (applied_entries sigma)).
{
  apply RIR_doGenericServer with (net := {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := sigma |}) (h := h); assumption.
  apply raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server; assumption.
  apply raft_invariant_handle_input; assumption.
  apply raft_net_invariant_client_request; assumption.
}
assumption.
Qed.
